name: Destroyed
description:
Game made in less than 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38 (theme: A Small World).

Fire missiles from the planet using the left mouse button.

Manned UFOs are stronger and tougher.

Survival mode is 2 minutes long and there's also an Endless mode.

Hint: Try normal difficulty survival mode before changing the difficulty. ;)

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/destroyed
